subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi, Andres Iniesta and Cristiano Ronaldo are a pleasurable contrast to the supposed player power exhibited by Wayne Rooney and his manipulative agent last week.
snippet: Lionel Messi, Andres Iniesta and Cristiano Ronaldo are a pleasurable contrast to the supposed player power exhibited by Wayne Rooney and his manipulative agent last week.
